DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study find good bad effect investigational drug call CP-533,536 patient close fracture tibial shaft undergo internal fixation use ream inter-locked IM nailing procedure
DOC.criteria: Males females 17 year old confirm closure tibial epiphysis , close fracture tibial diaphysis undergo treatment ream locked IM nailing procedure absence associate compartment syndrome vascular injury ; Closed tibial fracture Types A , B & C ( See OTA fracture classification ) include . Previous fracture tibia may impact nailing procedure impair visibility current fracture history osteomyelitis ; Subjects clinically significant injury , may significantly impair weight bearing affect limb ; Subjects fracture gap > 1cm initial surgery prior drug administration ; Any plan invasive non invasive intervention intend promote bone heal tibial fracture study allow first 24 week treatment .
